businessModels.title: Lead Gen/Agency Automation
businessModels.summary: Voice AI agents + lead gen systems for local businesses. $0→$38K MRR in 90 days case study. One person manages 50 clients.

details.caseStudy: Voice AI agency: $0 → $38K MRR in 90 days (73% profit margin). At 50 clients: $298K annual revenue, $179K net profit.
details.cac: $500-900 (8:1 to 15:1 LTV:CAC ratio). Channels: Referrals $100-300, SEO $205-450, Organic Social $300-600
details.marketingPlan: Target HVAC, dental, solar, legal, salons. Setup: $2K-5K + $1.2K-3.5K/month recurring. 95%+ automation via ElevenLabs/Bland AI + Make.com. Research: 88KB report with 90-day launch plan.

businessModels.title: AI Automation Services
businessModels.summary: AI customer support for e-commerce/SaaS. Writesonic $13.4M ARR case study. 60-80% of tickets handled autonomously.

details.caseStudy: Writesonic: $13.4M ARR, 10M users. Kira Systems: $416K/month. Local lead gen sites: 80-95% margins at $500-$2,000/month per site.
details.cac: $1,800-$2,800 blended. By channel: Partnerships $0-50, SEO $50-150, Cold Email $100-300, Paid Search $150-500
details.marketingPlan: Target mid-market e-commerce/SaaS ($5M-$50M revenue). Pricing: $2,500-$25,000/month. Year 2: $1.5M ARR with 17 clients. Research: 45KB report with 10 underserved niches.

businessModels.title: Content Monetization Empire
businessModels.summary: AI-automated newsletters + programmatic SEO. 1440 Newsletter: $15M/year with 4M subscribers.

details.caseStudy: 1440 Newsletter: $15M/year (4M subs). Inception Point AI: 3,000 podcast episodes/week at $1/episode. Why We Buy: $1M/year at 84% margins.
details.cac: $2-30 depending on channel. Newsletter subscriber acquisition: Meta ads $2-5, organic content near-zero.
details.marketingPlan: Newsletter: $180K-$360K year-1, 65-85% margins. SEO site: $10K-$15K year-1, exit at $25K-$72K. 95-98% automation. Research: 55KB report with 5 case studies.

businessModels.title: Micro-SaaS
businessModels.summary: Solo founder B2B tools. TweetHunter $83K MRR, Bannerbear $40K MRR. 80-85% automation achievable.

details.caseStudy: TweetHunter: $83K+ MRR. Bannerbear: $40K+ MRR. Simple Analytics: $35K+ MRR. Storemapper: $25K+ MRR.
details.cac: $15-400 by channel. SEO/Content: $30-80, Product-Led Growth: $15-50, Building in Public: $25-70, Paid Ads: $150-400 (scale only)
details.marketingPlan: Focus: ONE problem solved perfectly, $29-99/mo pricing, underserved B2B niches. No-code stack: Bubble vs Webflow. Build time: 4-8 weeks MVP. Research: 38KB blueprint with 8 niches.

businessModels.title: Digital Products
businessModels.summary: Templates, courses, tools. FormulaBot $220K/mo, HeadshotPro $300K/mo. 95-99% automation, 70-85% margins.

details.caseStudy: FormulaBot: $220k/month (Excel AI tool). HeadshotPro: $300k/month (AI headshots). NoteForms: $37k/month (Notion forms).
details.cac: $40-4,664 by channel. Referrals: $40, organic content: $50-200, SEO: $100-300, paid ads: $500-2,000
details.marketingPlan: Proven models: courses, templates, tools. $37K-$180K year-1 potential. Build audience with free value → Launch with waitlist → Automate with Gumroad/Lemon Squeezy. Research: 20KB report with 3 case studies.

businessModels.title: Marketplace/Arbitrage
businessModels.summary: AI arbitrage agency + print-on-demand. FBA average $160K revenue, POD 95-98% automated with 20-40% margins.

details.caseStudy: AI Arbitrage Agency: $231,700 year-1 net profit, 70-80% gross margins. Amazon FBA: Average seller $160K annual revenue (median $35K).
details.cac: $200-800 per client (agency), $5-15 per customer (POD). Industry: $53-91, by channel: $212-379
details.marketingPlan: Agency: 95% automation after setup. POD: 95-98% automation, 20-40% margins, break-even 6-12 months. Staircase strategy: start small, scale up. Research: 15KB report with 4 models.

businessModels.title: YouTube Shorts Automation
businessModels.summary: Automated short-form video creation. Currently operational at $0.31/video, 2min 13sec per video.

details.caseStudy: System launched: First Short published successfully. End-to-end pipeline: Script → Voiceover → S3 → Rendering → Upload in 2min 13sec.
details.cac: $0 (organic growth). Cost per video: $0.31. Monthly capacity: 200 Shorts at $62/month (Shotstack $40, ElevenLabs $11, Claude API $10, S3 $1)
details.marketingPlan: Full automation operational: Claude API script gen, ElevenLabs voice, Shotstack rendering, YouTube API upload. Captions synced, stock footage integrated. Ready for batch production.
